          <title>
            <string language="en">Physical change in chemical reactions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Körperliche Änderung in den chemischen 
Reaktionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement physique des réactions chimiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança física em reações químicas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento fisico nelle reazioni chimiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική αλλαγή στις χημικές αντιδράσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio físico en reacciones químicas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that lime water turns milky or cloudy when exposed to carbon dioxide gas.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbonates</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lime water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physical changes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Kalkwasser milchig 
oder bewölkt sich dreht, wenn es Kohlendioxydgas herausgestellt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'eau de chaux 
tourne laiteux ou nuageux une fois exposée au gaz d'anhydride 
carbonique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a água de cal gira 
leitoso ou cloudy quando exposta ao gás do dióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'acqua di calce 
gira latteo o nuvoloso una volta esposta al gas dell'anidride 
carbonica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το ύδωρ ασβέστη 
γίνεται γαλακτώδες ή νεφελώδες όταν στο διοξείδιο του άνθρακα 
εκτίθεται αέριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el agua de cal da 
vuelta lechoso o nublado cuando está expuesta al gas del bióxido de 
carbono.</string>
          </description>
